attributes.additional_details: Though this may take more time and greater effort,  it will benefit students by giving them a more accurate grade and also allow those students with mental health issues who may struggle with exams, a fairer chance at getting a true representation of their abilities. Having one exam determine it all seems unfair and lazy.
attributes.background: Taking a singular exam to determine ones outcome of life seems unfair and a poor determiner of proper knowledge. Having teacher input, as seen from the recent COVID-19 exams, aswell as coursework, mock exams and oral/written class work should all be examined to fully produce a final grade.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned with the current education system, but it's not clear how you want the Government to change this.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to reduce the extent to which standardised testing is used to grade students, if that is what you want to happen.
